function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical inspection and trial opportunities for products online","Impact":"Increased likelihood of product returns due to mismatched expectations","Mitigation":"Provide virtual try-on experiences or detailed product information to bridge the gap","Technologies":"Augmented reality, virtual reality, high-quality product imaging","People":"Online shoppers","Owner":"E-commerce businesses"},{"Description":"Perceived risks leading to online shopping abandonment","Impact":"Reduced conversion rates and loss of potential revenue","Mitigation":"Offer generous return policies, secure payment systems, and transparent product information","Technologies":"Secure online payment systems, customer reviews, live chat support","People":"Online shoppers","Owner":"E-commerce businesses"},{"Description":"Impact of product returns on retailers' bottom line","Impact":"Decreased profitability due to costs associated with reverse logistics","Mitigation":"Optimize supply chain and reverse logistics processes, improve product descriptions and imaging to reduce returns","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, high-quality product imaging, product information databases","People":"Online retailers","Owner":"E-commerce businesses"}]}
